title: Adding an audio level meter to the Google Camera app ?
content:
Hi,

I will not describe an issue but just make a suggestion for the Google Camera app.
Is it possible to add an audio level meter to the app ? For me, audio and video are both equally
important during video recording. I consider that adding an audio level meter is as important as
adding the compatibility with external mics (which is awesome).

At the same time, is it possible to check if it possible to record videos greater than 4Gb in
Android 11 ? I have heard about that, but I can't confirm that it is possible with the Google
Camera for now.

Thanks in advance !

Tony
